comments:

Not sure why so many people got included in the cc list - i clicked on the "Clone this bug" link from the previously submitted bug report. Sorry.
Could you please provide steps to reproduce this problem (by isolating the source that is causing this exception) ?

I need at least the source code of the file that cannot be formatted.
Without it or a reduced test case that reproduces this issue, there is no much I can do to fix it.
Thanks.

Closing as WORKSFORME.
Please reopen when you attach the source that is causing the grief + your code formatter preferences.
